sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import Header from "../../components/Header"; import Message from "../../components/LoadingError/Error"; const PlaceOrderPage = () => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); const navigate = useNavigate(); const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart); const userLogin = useSelector((state) => state.userLogin); const { userInfo } = userLogin; const placeOrderHandler = () => { navigate("/paymentQRCode"); }; return ( <>
Cliente

{userInfo.name}

{userInfo.email}

{/* 2 */}
Informações do pedido

Endereço de entrega: {cart.shippingAddress.address}

Forma de pagamento: {cart.paymentMethod}

{/* 3 */}
Entregar em:

Address: {cart.shippingAddress.city},{" "} {cart.shippingAddress.address},{" "} {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}

{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? ( Seu carrinho está vazio ) : ( <> {cart.cartItems.map((item, index) => (
{item.name}

Quantidade

{item.qtd}

Subtotal

${item.qtd * item.price}
))} )}
{/* total */}
Produtos ${cart.itemsPrice}
Frete ${cart.shippingPrice}
Total ${cart.totalPrice}
{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? null : ( )}
); }; export default PlaceOrderPage;
